snippet: Suki Kim talks about “Without You, There Is No Us,” and Meghan Daum discusses her new essay collection, “The Unspeakable.”
abstract: Suki Kim talks about “Without You, There Is No Us,” and Meghan Daum discusses her new essay collection, “The Unspeakable.”
lead_paragraph: In The New York Times Book Review, Euny Hong reviews Suki Kim’s “Without You, There Is No Us: My Time With the Sons of North Korea’s Elite.” Ms. Hong writes:

headline.main: Book Review Podcast: A Rare View of North Korea
